underlying_goal: Observe and document a primary Claude session's work on examining global/project variables and data structures in a PPV registration and check workflow system, creating searchable memory observations for future sessions
friction_detail: Background task output was unavailable when first queried, limiting initial observation capability.
brief_summary: User asked the memory agent to observe and document a primary session exploring global/project variables and data structures in a PPV workflow system; the agent created structured observations from multiple file reads and bash outputs but the session was still ongoing.
